description: Adds a new dependency to pyproject.toml and installs it.

options.description: The group to add the dependency to. [default: "main"]
options.name: --group

options.description: Add as a development dependency. (shortcut for '-G dev')
options.name: --dev

options.description: Extras to activate for the dependency. (multiple values allowed)
options.name: --extras

options.description: Add as an optional dependency to an extra.
options.name: --optional

options.description: Python version for which the dependency must be installed.
options.name: --python

options.description: Platforms for which the dependency must be installed.
options.name: --platform

options.description: Environment markers which describe when the dependency should be installed.
options.name: --markers

options.description: Name of the source to use to install the package.
options.name: --source

options.description: Output the operations but do not execute anything (implicitly enables --verbose).
options.name: --dry-run

options.description: Do not perform operations (only update the lockfile).
options.name: --lock
